column2: amazed by the service and food at this place. Saw the high rating on Yelp and thought " to good to be true".  Sat at the bar with my wife and the "magic" happened.  Ordered some sides "dr pepper wings and grilled cheese (short rib)". Holy crap
column3: William our bartender did not lead us astray.  Speaking of William
column4: what spectacular service from this young man. Spot on recommendations and a solid old fashion maker.
